overview: 1977 - Rome Sweet Rome. Thirty minutes of highlights from the final plus a detailed look at the 3-1 victory over St. Etienne and action from both legs of the semi finals against Zurich. 1978 - London Calling. Full highlights from the final, goals from the games against Benfica and Dynamo Dresden and a look at the influence Kenny Dalglish had on the side. 1981 - Paris Match. With full highlights from the final, an insight into the obstacles the foreign clubs would put in the way of Liverpool off the field, the 10-1 victory over Oulu Palloseura and a 4-0 victory over Alex Ferguson's Aberdeen. 1984 - No Place Like Rome. Thirty minutes of footage from the final, the story behind Alan Kennedy's second trophy winning goal and the penalty shoot out in full.
title: Liverpool FC: Champions Of Europe (1977 - 1984)
